title: Legislators
description: Members of legislative bodies who participate in the duties of legislatures or governing councils

title: Financial Managers
description: Plan direct and coordinate the financial operations of an organization

title: Human Resources Managers
description: Plan organize direct control and evaluate the operations of human resources departments

title: Purchasing Managers
description: Plan organize direct control and evaluate the activities of a purchasing department

title: Other Administrative Services Managers
description: Plan organize direct control and evaluate departments that provide various administrative services

title: Architecture and Science Managers
description: Plan organize direct control and evaluate the activities of architecture and science departments

title: Engineering Managers
description: Plan organize direct control and evaluate the activities of an engineering department

title: Computer and Information Systems Managers
description: Plan organize direct control and evaluate the activities of organizations that analyze develop

title: Research and Development Managers
description: Plan organize direct control and evaluate the activities of scientific research and development

title: Physicists and Astronomers
description: Conduct theoretical and applied research to extend knowledge of natural phenomena
